name: MEC Igopogo Neoprene Watershoes - Unisex
description: These are a far cry from funny-looking neoprene booties. The skate-inspired hightop design uses 3mm neoprene to keep feet warm, with perforations in the toe and heel so water can drain. The scythed rubber outsole provides traction on wet surfaces. These are an excellent option for SUP enthusiasts and paddlers looking for warmth and protection with more style than a traditional bootie.Uppers are 3mm neoprene with nylon facing and backing for greater durability.Perforated neoprene in the toe and heel allows water to escape.Stiffened heel cup keeps shoe in place.Outsoles are non-marking rubber, scythed for secure grip on slick surfaces.Unisex design fits men or women. Sold in men's sizes. For a women’s size, subtract one (for a women’s size 8, choose size 7). Round up if you are between full sizes.
